an4.71:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu apannakappatipadam patipanno hoti, yoni cassa araddha hoti asavanam khayaya.
an4.71:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti, bahussuto hoti, araddhaviriyo hoti, pannava hoti.
an4.71:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu apannakappatipadam patipanno hoti, yoni cassa araddha hoti asavanam khayaya”ti.
